scenario.name: mcptt_private_call_manual
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field7] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field7]> Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mcptt";+g.3gpp.mcptt Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Max-Forwards: 15 Accept-Contact: *;+g.3gpp.mcptt;require;explicit Accept-Contact: *;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mcptt";require;explicit P-Preferred-Service: urn:urn-7:3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mcptt P-Preferred-Identity: <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Session-Expires: 3600 Supported: timer Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, MESSAGE, OPTIONS, NOTIFY, PRACK, UPDATE, REFER User-Agent: MCPTTCLIENT Answer-Mode: Manual Resource-Priority: mcpttp.5 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=YKP42ALY6Zy3ey Content-Length: [len]
--YKP42ALY6Zy3ey Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=MCPTTCLIENT 1183811731 4248272445 IN IP4 [media_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=label:1 i=speech a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000/1 a=ptime:20 a=maxptime:240 m=application 1234 udp MCPTT a=fmtp:MCPTT mc_queing;mc_priority=7;mc_granted;mc_implicit_request
--YKP42ALY6Zy3ey Content-Type: application/vnd.3gpp.mcptt-info+xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <mcpttinfo xmlns="urn:3gpp:ns:mcpttInfo:1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <mcptt-Params> <session-type>private</session-type> </mcptt-Params> </mcpttinfo>
--YKP42ALY6Zy3ey Content-Type: application/resource-lists+xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <resource-lists xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:resource-lists" xmlns:cc="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:copycontrol"> <list> <entry uri="sip:[field5]@[field6]" cc:copyControl="to"/> </list> </resource-lists>
--YKP42ALY6Zy3ey--

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [routes] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field7]>[peer_tag_param] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]>;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mcptt";+g.3gpp.mcptt Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0 Max-Forwards: 15 Accept-Contact: *;+g.3gpp.mcptt;require;explicit Accept-Contact: *;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mcptt";require;explicit P-Preferred-Service: urn:urn-7:3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mcptt P-Preferred-Identity: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>
